Articles.Content:
Ohoho do you know what time of the year it is?

Its 0.17 EASTER EGG HUNTING YAYYYYY

Anyway post any easter eggs you find. Apparently theres a dead space kraken one of the new planets/moons. But hey, thats just what i hear who knows. Get searching! Im currently checking out the moon Laythe (ocean world)

Post spoiler warnings for people who unfortunatley wander into this thread not wanting to know where they are.
BAM http://i.imgur.com/vCJwx.jpg
Why did i have to see that at 9 at night??
lol remind you of 'mission to mars'? Movie?

I saw a post on reddit regarding a certain geological feature that had similar characteristics to that of a Kerbal... I think this one is going to be easy to guess... A face on Duna!

Coordinates haven't been disclosed yet. I'm hoping I'll find it soon.

Well, I've been ninja'd by 3 posters.

That's not a face. It's just the way the shadows are on the rock.

The human brain is programmed to see faces everywhere.
He told you so

Holy crap how did you find that?

Has anyone located the dead space kraken yet?

Holy crap how did you find that?

Has anyone located the dead space kraken yet?

No lie!

I've only made 2 successful Duna orbits/landings thus far (always manage to screw up my orbital insertion ... overshoot, then don't have enough fuel to course-correct).

I now have a Duna Recon Orbiter in a polar orbit mapping Duna for anomolies. One over Eve as well. Will be sending a fleet of them out on Sunday for a complete map of each world/worldlet, to see what's out there.

Nice find on the

Face.

. Would LOVE to know the coords (PM or spoiler it if you do post it openly!)
Dead space Kraken's on Bop (not my video):
At least two anomalies on Duna ... won't say more than that
There are three sites of interest on Duna. One may be broken, however, and situated several km underground...

There are three sites of interest on Duna. One may be broken, however, and situated several km underground...

Time to invoke the kraken

I've got two mapped ... third one is elusive atm. I have a lander approaching 1 of the two (assuming it's not the

Face.

Not sure I have enough fuel to land though. Screwed up (again) my orbital insertion, so I'm running on fumes trying to land.

If I remember right, Duna is the Mars analogy.

If that's true, I'd be so happy if the third (possibly broken one) was a Mass Effect reference. =3

It probably isn't, I'm well aware, but a guy can dream, right?
The ISA mapsat gets three anomalies on Duna, i will investigate later, but no anomalies on Ike.
Ike has one anomaly, but I doubt it would show up on mapsat

Ike has one anomaly, but I doubt it would show up on mapsat

Rover mission to Ike scheduled for later ....

Nova, you're killing me. Ike was my next stop on Sunday. Goal is to get a satellite over every planet/planetoid in the system by Sunday, to investigate the possibilities. I've got four en-route, and three in orbit now, taking data. Tomorrow, I should have every major planet/planetoid covered ... just awaiting the time warp to get them into orbit.

I've found the face on Duna as well

The coÃƒÂ¶rdinates, for people with interest

It looks something like the Curiosity landing site
Ok I just saw this on Gilly, not sure if its a texture glitch or not, only seems to be on one side of it

There are three sites of interest on Duna. One may be broken, however, and situated several km underground...

One is defenetly underground, you can't see it,but you just KNOW it's there

Edit: This is all lie... the one that is underground i didn't find. But the one you know it's there,

You can hear it !!!!

Edited September 22, 2012 by Legal2k

One may be broken, however, and situated several km underground...

Sounds like a nice place to set up a research base and look into teleportation technology... I'm sure nothing horrific would come of it, but might need to station some kerbal space marines... just in case.

Dead space Kraken's on Bop (not my video):

Alas! The space kraken is not dead! It is fake!

The 2 RSC thrusters are out of place! Strangely when I timed warped again, they were fixed...has he become passive-aggressive?

Alas! The space kraken is not dead! It is fake!

The 2 RSC thrusters are out of place! Strangely when I timed warped again, they were fixed...has he become passive-aggressive?

This happens to me when the game reduces my warp for me when I get close to the Sun, I time warp again and they come back to their place.
I've found an sstv broadcast on Duna! Will try to demodulate ASAP!
